armorDesc: Set Bonus: +3 defense, +5 defense when below 50% life

Wulfrum Helm: 10% increased melee damage
Set Bonus: +100 Aggro

Wulfrum Helmet: 10% increased summon damage
Set Bonus: +1 max minion

Wulfrum Mask: 10% increased rogue damage
Set Bonus: Maximum rogue stealth of 50
Set Bonus: 5% increased rogue damage.  Grants the player wings to glide and negate fall damage. Maximum rogue stealth of 50.
Grants immunity to the Mighty Wind debuff

Set bonus: Pressing ▼ Down twice in quick succession summons a sandnado that is roughly 10 tiles tall, that the player will jet upwards and stand on. Nearby non-boss enemies are sucked inwards and are dealt a continous 20 damage per second. The tornado dissipates after 20 seconds or if the player jumps or is knocked off.
Set bonus: Ranged attacks do 1 more damage. Ranged critical strikes can rarely whip up a sandstorm.
+5 defense, +10% damage reduction and +30% movement speed while submerged in liquid
Set Bonus: 10% increase to headpiece's damage type and +3 life regen while submerged in liquid. 10% chance to throw returning seashell projectiles when using weapons.

Victide Helm: 5% increased melee damage
Set Bonus: +200 Aggro

Victide Helmet: 10% increased summon damage
Set Bonus: Summons an urchin, +1 max minion

Victide Headgear: 5% increased rogue damage
Set Bonus: Maximum rogue stealth of 90
craftingItems: 24 Victide Bar for set + all helm types

armorDesc: 35% increased movement speed while submerged in liquid.

Set Bonus: The Poisoned debuff is inflicted onto any attacking enemy. Grants a double jump that leaves behind a sulphurous bubble that floats upward and inflicts Venom on enemy hits. Striking an enemy will inflict the Poisoned debuff onto them. Maximum rogue stealth of 95.
Set Bonus: Increases maximum falling speed by 50% and grants immunity to falling damage. Taking over 25 damage in one hit will cause a spread of homing feathers to fall.

Aerospec Helm: 8% increased melee damage
Set Bonus: 5% increased melee critical strike chance and 5% increased movement speed. +300 Aggro.

Aerospec Hood: 8% increased ranged damage
Set Bonus: 5% increased ranged critical strike chance and 5% increased movement speed

Aerospec Hat: 8% increased magic damage and +20 max mana
Set Bonus: 5% increased magic critical strike chance and 5% increased movement speed

Aerospec Helmet: 5% increased minion damage and movement speed
Set Bonus: +11% minion damage and +1 max minion. Summons a valkyrie

Aerospec Headgear: 8% increased rogue damage and 5% increased movement speed
Set Bonus: 5% increased rogue critical strike chance and 5% increased movement speed. Maximum rogue stealth of 100.
Set Bonus: Grants the player an extra jump and increased jump height. Taking over 100 damage in one hit makes you immune to damage for an extended period of time.

Statigel Helm: 10% increased melee damage and melee speed, 7% increased melee critical strike chance
Set Bonus: +400 Aggro
Statigel Headgear: 10% increased ranged damage, 7% increased ranged critical strike chance
Statigel Cap: 10% increased magic damage and 10% decreased mana cost, 7% increased magic critical strike chance, +30 max mana

Statigel Hood: Increased minion knockback
Set Bonus: 18% increased minion damage and +1 max minion. Summons a baby slime god.

Statigel Mask: 10% increased rogue damage and 34% chance to not consume thrown items, 7% increased rogue critical strike chance and 12% increased movement speed
Set Bonus: Maximum rogue stealth of 100
The player can move freely through liquids
Set Bonus: Summons 2 shellfish. 10% increased damage and slowed horizontal movement.
45% increased chance to not consume rogue items
Set Bonus: 15% increased rogue damage and knockback. Immunity to knockback. Stealth strikes deal double knockback and cause an astral explosion. Maximum rogue stealth of 100.

Daedalus Helm: 10% increased melee damage, critical strike chance, melee speed and movement speed
Set Bonus: 5% increased melee damage. +500 Aggro. Reflects projectiles back at enemies. Reflected projectiles only deal 50% damage to the player. This has a 90 second cooldown

Daedalus Headgear: 13% increased ranged damage and 7% increased ranged critical strike chance, reduces ammo cost by 20%
Set Bonus: 5% increased ranged damage. Getting hit releases a blast of crystal shards

Daedalus Hood: 13% increased magic damage and 7% increased magic critical strike chance, +60 max mana, 10% reduced mana cost
Set Bonus: 5% increased magic damage. 10% chance to absorb physical attacks and projectiles when hit. Absorbing an attack heals the player for 1/2 of that attack's damage

Daedalus Mask: 5% increased minion damage
Set Bonus: 20% increased minion damageand +2 max minions. Summons a daedalus crystal

Daedalus Facemask: 13% increased rogue damage and 7% increased rogue critical strike chance, increases rogue weapon velocity by 15%, 17% increased movement speed
Set Bonus: 5% increased rogue damage. Rogue projectiles throw out crystal shards as they travel. Maximum rogue stealth of 105.
Grants the effect of the Obsidian Rose
Immunity to On Fire!, Brimstone Flames, and Frostburn

Set Bonus: Grants an additional 15% increased damage and magic critical strike chance. Pressing Armor Set Bonus will activate Brimflame Frenzy for 10 seconds, temporarily boosting the player’s damage by 30% while significantly reducing the player’s life regen and disabling mana regeneration. Brimflame Frenzy has a 30 second cooldown after its usage.
+30 defense, +5 life regen and 40% increased movement speed while submerged in liquids
Grants the ability to swim and breathe underwater.
Reduces breath loss, defense loss, and increases light level in the Abyss
Set Bonus: 10% increased minion damage and +2 max minions. 30% increased minion damage while submerged in liquids. Grants the ability to climb walls.
Set Bonus: Rogue weapons have a chance to create explosions on hit. Stealth strikes will always create an explosion. Maximum rogue stealth of 110

Reaver Helm: 15% increased damage reduction but 30% decreased damage. +50 max life. Passively regenerates one health point every second
Set Bonus: +10 defense, +3 life regen, 20% decreased movement speed and flight time. +600 Aggro. Reduces the life regen lost from damage over time debuffs by 20%. All attacks have a small chance to steal life and speed up the rate of life regen, releases thorn vines and has a chance to grant the Reaver Rage buff to the player when hit

Reaver Visage: 10% increased jump speed and 25% increased movement speed
Set Bonus:  Grants immunity to fall damage and allows constant jumping. 10% increased flight time and horizontal wing speed. Hooks fly out and retract 10% faster. Reduces the cooldown of dashes

Reaver Headgear: 10% increased pick speed and 20% increased block/wall placement speed. Temporary immunity to lava and can move freely through liquids
Set Bonus:  Causes nearby treasure to sparkle. Increased item grab range and block placement range. Mining tiles restores breath while underwater. Summons a reaver orb to light up the area around you and reduces enemy aggression, even in the abyss. Provides a small amount of light in the abyss

Immunity to fire damage
Set Bonus: Inferno effect when below 50% life, 20% chance to emit a blazing explosion when hit

Hydrothermic Helm: 12% increased melee damage, melee speed and movement speed, 10% increased melee critical strike chance. Melee attacks inflict on fire
Set Bonus: 5% increased melee damage. +700 Aggro. Melee attacks and projectiles cause chaos flames to erupt on enemy hits

Hydrothermic Headgear: 12% increased ranged damage and 10% increased ranged critical strike chance, reduces ammo cost by 25%
Set Bonus: 5% increased ranged damage. Ranged attacks fire a homing chaos flare every 0.33 seconds

Hydrothermic Mask: 12% increased magic damage and 10% increased magic critical strike chance, +100 max mana
Set Bonus: 5% increased magic damage and 15% reduced mana cost. Magic attacks summon damaging and healing flare orbs on hit

Hydrothermic Helmet: 5% increased minion damage and increased minion knockback
Set Bonus: 40% increased minion damage and +2 max minions. Summons a hydrothermic vent

Hydrothermic Hood: 12% increased rogue damage and 10% increased rogue critical strike chance, 50% chance to not consume thrown items and 15% increased movement speed
Set Bonus: 5% increased rogue damage. Rogue weapons unleash a volley of homing chaos flames around the player every 2.5 seconds. Maximum rogue stealth of 110.
Halves the damage taken from the Plague debuff

Set Bonus: 25% reduced ammo usage, 5% increased flight time. The Plague debuff causes enemies to take 10% more damage from ranged projectiles. Getting hit causes Plague Cinders to rain above the player. Pressing Armor Set Bonus will blind the player for 5 seconds. While the player is blinded, their ranged damage and critical strike chance is raised by 60% and 20% respectively. This effect has a 25 second cooldown.
Halves the damage taken from the Plague debuff
Friendly bees and wasps inflict the Plague
You grow flowers on the grass beneath you, alongside random dye plants on grassless dirt
You spawn bees while sprinting or dashing
Set Bonus: +3 max minions. Grants a plague dash to ram enemies and inflict the Plague. Summons a lil' plaguebringer to protect you and empower nearby minions
Creature, treasure, ore, and danger detection

Set Bonus: 15% increased movement speed, +3 max minions, 28% increased damage, and 21% increased critical strike chance. With a 1-second cooldown, critical hits will cause three fallen, hallowed, and astral stars to rain down on the target and deal 130 damage
23% increased rogue damage and critical strike chance

Set Bonus: 9% increased rogue damage and velocity. Grants Empyrean Rage and Empyrean Wrath buffs when hit. Grants Wrath and Rage buffs when under 50% health. Maximum rogue stealth of 115.Rogue projectiles can spawn a random Empyrean projectile upon striking an enemy:
Empyrean Star which homes in strongly on enemies. It deals 80% damage of the projectile that spawned it.
Two Empyrean Orbs, one damaging that homes in on enemies and one healing that homes in on the player.
The damaging orb deals 62.5% of the projectile's damage.
The healing orb heals for 10% of the projectile's damage. If piercing, it heals 5% of the second hit's damage, and does not heal for subsequent hits.
Empyrean Fire spark which falls to the ground and lingers for a few seconds. It deals 15% damage of the projectile that spawned it.
Empyrean Blast explosion that deals 20% damage of the projectile that spawned it.
Empyrean Bubble which homes in weakly on enemies. It deals 60% damage of the projectile that spawned it.
Set Bonus: Reduced enemy spawn rates. Increased heart pickup range. Enemies have a chance to drop extra hearts on death

Tarragon Helm: 10% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: +800 Aggro. 25% chance to gain the Tarra Life buff when hit. Press Armor Set Bonus to heavily reduce contact damage for 10 seconds, this has a 30 second cooldown

Tarragon Visage: 10% increased ranged damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: With a 1-second cooldown, ranged projectiles split into life energy and leaves on death

Tarragon Mask: 20% increased magic damage, 10% increased magic critical strike chance, +100 max mana and 15% reduced mana cost
Set Bonus: Every 5th critical strike fires a leaf storm. Magic projectiles have a 50% chance to heal on enemy hits, amount healed is based on projectile damage

Tarragon Horned Helm: 5% increased minion damage
Set Bonus: 50% increased minion damage and +3 max minion. Summons a life aura that damages nearby enemies

Tarragon Helmet: 10% increased rogue damage and critical strike chance, 12% increased movement speed
Set Bonus: After every 25 rogue critical hits grants 3 seconds of damage immunity with a cooldown of 30 seconds. While afflicted with a debuff, 10% increased rogue damage. Maximum rogue stealth of 115.
2% increased jump speed and 10% increased flight time
While no bosses are alive, any enemy with less than 500 max health deals no contact damage to the player
Magic attacks have a 20% chance to fire a pair of homing explosive rockets

Set Bonus: +40 max mana and 15% reduced mana cost. Increased mana regeneration. Press Armor Set Bonus to unleash a barrage of death lasers at the cursor for the next 5 seconds. This has a 30 second cooldown
+10 life regen and +30 defense while in lava
Set Bonus: Greatly increases life regeneration. Enemies below 50% life have a chance to drop hearts when struck. Enemies killed during a Blood Moon have a much higher chance to drop Blood Orbs

Bloodflare Ram Mask: 10% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: +900 Aggro. True melee strikes will heal on hit. After striking an enemy 15 times with true melee, a blood frenzy is entered for 5 seconds, giving 25% increased melee damage and critical strike chance and halved contact damage. This effect has a 30 second cooldown

Bloodflare Horned Helm: 10% increased ranged damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: Press Armor Set Bonus to unleash the lost souls of Polterghast. This effect has a 30 second cooldown. Ranged weapons have a chance to also fire bloodsplosion orbs

Bloodflare Hydra Hood: 10% increased magic damage and critical strike chance, +100 max mana and 17% reduced mana cost
Set Bonus: Magic weapons fire ghostly bolts every 1.67 seconds and magic critical strikes cause flame explosions every 2 seconds

Bloodflare Wyvern Helm: 5% increased minion damage
Set Bonus: 50% increased minion damage and +3 max minions. Summons Polterghast's mines. When above 90% life, 10% increased minion damage, and when below 50% life, +20 defense and 2 life regen

Bloodflare Imp Mask: 10% increased rogue damage and critical strike chance, 15 % increased movement speed
Set Bonus: When above 80% life, +30 and 5% increased rogue critical strike chance. When below 80% life, 10% increased rogue damage. Rogue critical strike heal the player. Maximum rogue stealth of 120
All attacks inflict Crush Depth on hit.

Set Bonus: 10% increased damage and critical strike chance, +2 max minions, armor penetration increased by 15. Summons six tentacles from the player, which automatically attack nearby enemies and have great lifesteal capabilities.Press Armor Set Bonus to activate Abyssal Madness, buffing damage and critical strike chance and giving the tentacles increased range and aggression. Abyssal Madness lasts for 5 seconds and has a 25 second cooldown.
Enemies take damage when they hit you
Set Bonus: Pressing God Slayer Dash allows the player to dash a great distance in 8 directions depending on what movement keys are held. This has a 35 second cooldown

God Slayer Horned Greathelm: 14% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: +1000 Aggro. Taking over 80 damage in one hit releases a swarm of high-damage god killer darts, gives the player an even stronger thorns effect, an attack that would deal 80 damage or less will cause the attack to be decreased to 1 damage

God Slayer Helmet: 14% increased ranged damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: Ranged weapons fire a god killing shrapnel round every 2.5 seconds

God Slayer Mask: 14% increased rogue damage and critical strike chance, 18% increased movement speed
Set Bonus: While at full HP all rogue stats are boosted by 10%. Extra immunity frames if taking more than 80 damage. Maximum rogue stealth of 120

15% increased damage reduction during the Pumpkin and Frost Moons
This is separate from normal DR and therefore ignores Calamity's DR scaling system

Set Bonus: Life regeneration temporarily increased by 7 on every minion hit. The duration increases by 1/3 of a second per minion hit, up to a maximum of 1.5 seconds. Grants the Panic! buff when the player is hit. Reduces the summon penalty to 75% instead of 50%. Immunity to several debuffs.

Set Bonus: All projectiles spawn healing leaf orbs on enemy hitsMax run speed and acceleration boosted by 5%If the player is reduced to 1 HP, the player will not die from any further damage for 8 seconds. This effect only triggers once per life.

Silva Masked Cap: 23% increased magic damage, 13% increased critical strike chance, +100 max mana and 19% reduced mana cost
Set Bonus: With a 5-second cooldown, magic projectiles which cannot pierce cause an explosion on enemy hits.

Silva Horned Hood: 10% increased minion damage
Set Bonus: 65% increased minion damage and +5 max minions. Summons an ancient leaf prism.
Standing still grants 20% increased damage and critical strike chance and a significant boost to knockback
Nearby enemies are frozen when taking damage
Magic carpet deploys when out of flight time

Set Bonus: All non-class Tarragon and Bloodflare set bonus effectsGodslayer armor set bonus effects for Auric Tesla Royal Helm, Hooded Facemask and Plumed HelmSilva armor set bonus effects for Auric Tesla Wire-Hammed Facemask and Space HelmetAll projectiles spawn healing auric orbs on enemy hits

Auric Tesla Royal Helm: 20% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: +1200 Aggro. Melee Tarragon, Bloodflare, and Godslayer armor effects.

Auric Tesla Hooded Facemask: 30% increased ranged damage and critical strike chance
Set Bonus: Ranged Tarragon, Bloodflare, and Godslayer armor effects.

Auric Tesla Wire-Hemmed Visage: 30% increased magic damage, 20% increased magic critical strike chance, +100 max mana and 20% reduced mana cost
Set Bonus: Magic Tarragon, Bloodflare, and Silva armor effects. Max run speed and acceleration boosted by 5%

Auric Tesla Space Helmet: 15% increased minion damage
Set Bonus: 75% increased minion damage and +6 max minions. Summoner Tarragon, Bloodflare, and Silva armor effects. Max run speed and acceleration boosted by 5%

Auric Tesla Plumed Helm: 20% increased rogue damage, critical strike chance, and movement speed
Set Bonus: Rogue Tarragon, Bloodflare, and Godslayer armor effects. Maximum rogue stealth of 130
Enemies have 100x their contact damage reflected back at them when hitting the player

Set Bonus: 100% increased minion damage and +10 max minions. All attacks inflict Demon Flames. Shadowbeams and demon scythes will fire down when hit. Summons a friendly red devil. Pressing Armor Set Bonus causes the player to receive 25% more damage but deal 125% more damage to enemies and also enrage nearby enemies.
